mapper.update: UPDATE Achievement SET title = #{title}, category = #{category}, abstract = #{abstractText}, contents = #{contents}, attachmentLink = #{attachmentLink}, coverImage = #{coverImage}, status = #{status}, viewStatus = #{viewStatus} WHERE achievementID = #{achievementID}
mapper.select: SELECT achievementID, title, category, abstract AS abstractText, contents, attachmentLink, coverImage, creationTime, teamID, status, viewStatus FROM Achievement WHERE achievementID = #{achievementID}

SELECT achievementID, title, category, abstract AS abstractText, contents, attachmentLink, coverImage, creationTime, teamID, status, viewStatus FROM Achievement WHERE teamID = #{teamID} ORDER BY creationTime DESC

SELECT achievementID, title, category, abstract AS abstractText, contents, attachmentLink, coverImage, creationTime, teamID, status, viewStatus FROM Achievement WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND category = #{category} ORDER BY creationTime DESC
SELECT achievementID, title, category, abstract AS abstractText, contents, attachmentLink, coverImage, creationTime, teamID, status, viewStatus FROM Achievement ORDER BY creationTime DESC
